awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 2 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: Airliner crashes near Los Angeles due to unusual string of coincidences. Stewardess, who is sole survivor, joins airline executives in discovering the causes of the crash.
plot: A man refuses to believe that pilot error caused a fatal crash, and persists in looking for another reason.
title: Fate Is the Hunter
